content: Hello there! I'm Lynx, a spirited undergraduate cat majoring in Computer Science, nya. My passions are as varied as a cat's whims - from literature to technology, whipping up delicious treats in the kitchen, giving pets the cuddles they deserve, swaying to lo-fi hip-hop, and playing all sorts of sports with a feline's agility, nya.

I'm always on the prowl to learn and grow, with a particular fancy for coding, but only with the most graceful and stylish flair, nya. I work my paws off to achieve my goals, always hunting for new challenges to pounce on. And, oh, let me just purr this out - I'm a gigantic fan of Arch Linux and utterly smitten with anything that's as cute as me, nya. Thanks for lending your ears (or should I say whiskers?) to my little introduction. Catch you later, nya!
